entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
